name: Survarium - Steam Sniper Pack
detailed_description:
If your style is eliminating opponents at a distance then this Sniper Pack is exactly what you need! We made sure to include high-profile gear to allow you compete in the top-rank battles in Survarium. Let your new motto be: one shot – one kill!

-Includes-

The Unique Remington 700 "Executioner" in Steam Camo

The name says it all. Execute your enemies and leave others in fear with this popular breed of rifle. Power is the secret here.

Bonuses of this item include:
+25% Silver
+?? Random modifier
+?? Random modifier
+?? Random modifier

30 Days Premium

Advance your character. Gain extra experience, silver, faction reputation etc.

Bonuses of this item include:
+50% Silver
+50% Reputation
+50% Experience

3 Stash Maps

Use stash maps to seek hidden treasures in the game.

Exclusive Deer Hunter Decal

Place it anywhere on your character's armor or pants.

short_description: If your style is eliminating opponents at a distance then this Sniper Pack is exactly what you need! Let your new motto be: one shot – one kill!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista (Service Pack 2 + Platform update), Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4400 2.0 GHz or Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 4200+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 3870
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game does not support Windows XP!
